div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Vol.75, Wk.of Mar. 10, 1928, P.139.

body.p: Mr. Berkman is the judge for the nineteenth consecutive year for the Mid-West Conference Gymnastic Meet to be held on March 10, at Bartlett Gymnasium.

Mr. Berkman is the originator of the Girls' Olympic Games which are conducted by the Daily News in Chicago, each year. He was the sponsor for the Post-Office Meet which was held at the Dexter Park Pavillion in 1907.
